results.content: It was a great course. Filip teaches us all the concepts from ground up. He takes his time explaining code, using debuggers, showing us "exactly what is happening behind the scenes". He is the most helpful teacher I've met on Udemy. He even takes his time explaining CSS. I loved the clean code approach that's taken in this course and will try to follow it in my upcoming projects. Thank you so much Filip! Cheers!

results.content: This course became very difficult for me in the last sections. Maybe because I am a student, my experience and knowledge are not strong enough to fully understand this course. Overall this is a good course, the author has explained very carefully in the teaching process. In the future, I will revision course to better understand it.

results.content:
***READ BEFORE BUY*** 
 The course is full of unnecessary comments not related to the course's project, some sections are a total mess, most part of the code is very opinionated. About the instructor, he has an horrible English accent, sometimes impossible to understand, and another weird bad habits while coding, for example, for every new file, he suddenly jumps randomly many lines with no logic, it is totally 0 clean code.

results.content: I am still at the beginning of this course and have just finished the typescript section. let me say this, I have spent many hours on other courses and youtube to understand typescript and found it really challenging and almost lost all hope until I stumbled on this course. I must say I am so happy to purchase this course. The instructor has done an amazing job in demystifying typescript. I am so happy and thank you to Filip. You are a genius. :)
